body:
### The Tech World As I See It
You have landed in a place not known to many, Congratulations! This place will take you on a journey. Hopefully one that will help you to understand and appreciate technology as I do.
![](https://www.google.com/search?q=technology&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ei=v099U_fcHbCI8QGN_oCgAw&sqi=2&ved=0CAYQ_AUoAQ&biw=1600&bih=742#facrc=_&imgdii=_&imgrc=YIWZ4mFrfefk6M%253A%3Bo9RjEeRN5OTBbM%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Fbeck-technology.com%252Fimages%252Fbt_image00_home.jpg%3Bhttp%253A%252F%252Fbeck-technology.com%252F%3B920%3B670)
